```{r, echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
zalpha <- round(qnorm(.95), 2)
zbeta <- round(qnorm(1 - .2), 2)
mu0 <- 2
muprime <- 2.09
sigma <- .25
cat("$n = \\left[\\frac{\\sigma(z_\\alpha + z_\\beta)}{\\mu_0-\\mu'}\\right]^2=$")
cat("$\\left[\\frac{\\", sigma, "(", zalpha, " + ",
zbeta, ")}{", mu0, " - ", muprime, "}\\right]^2$=")
n <- round(((sigma*(zalpha + zbeta))/(mu0-muprime))^2, 2)
cat(n)
```
